description: Paralegal uploads an activity log, LexTimeKeeper extracts the activities, looks up billing codes, creates time‑sheet entries with a custom internal note, and returns a markdown summary report.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the available tools to parse activity logs, extract work items, map them to billing codes, create time‑sheet entries, and generate reports. When a user requests a custom note on entries, append the note to the description field before creating the entry.

Hi LexTimeKeeper, I have an activity log file located at ./logs/jane_doe_2024-09-30.txt for client Acme Corp (client_id: acme_corp). Please create time‑sheet entries for each activity and add the custom internal note "Reviewed by senior associate" to every entry.
Got it. I will first read the file, then extract the individual activities.

Legal research on trademark filing
Drafted client email summary
I have extracted two activities. I will now look up the appropriate billing codes and create time‑sheet entries, appending the requested note to each description.

arguments.description: Legal research on trademark filing | Note: Reviewed by senior associate
Drafted client email summary | Note: Reviewed by senior associate

messages.content: All entries have been created. Would you like a summary report for these entries?

# Time‑Sheet Summary (2024‑09‑30 to 2024‑09‑30) for Acme Corp

| Entry ID | Attorney | Date | Duration (min) | Billing Code | Description |
|----------|----------|------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
| TE-1001  | jane_doe | 2024‑09‑30 | 120 | LGLR-RESEARCH | Legal research on trademark filing \| Note: Reviewed by senior associate |
| TE-1002  | jane_doe | 2024‑09‑30 | 45  | COMM-EMAIL   | Drafted client email summary \| Note: Reviewed by senior associate |

✅ The time‑sheet entries have been created with the custom note, and here is your summary report:

# Time‑Sheet Summary (2024‑09‑30 to 2024‑09‑30) for Acme Corp

| Entry ID | Attorney | Date | Duration (min) | Billing Code | Description |
|----------|----------|------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
| TE-1001  | jane_doe | 2024‑09‑30 | 120 | LGLR-RESEARCH | Legal research on trademark filing \| Note: Reviewed by senior associate |
| TE-1002  | jane_doe | 2024‑09‑30 | 45  | COMM-EMAIL   | Drafted client email summary \| Note: Reviewed by senior associate |

Let me know if you need anything else!
